text: I trying to figure out the _Ember way_ to do this and could do with some help: I’m getting the User’s location using `ember-cli-geo` which is fine but I need to use the `lat` and `long` to hit an API and store all the information on some type of object. Doesn’t go to a DB so don’t need Ember Data. What’s the right way to do this? Should I use a generic Ember object and passing the response from the API into the object during `init` and using that in the template?
